Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Atlanta in 1982...
Injured on 4/12/1982 with a Fractured Foot, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/31/1982 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1987, off Jimmy Key (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1987, off Steve Fireovid (PIT)...
Injured on 6/14/1988 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/22/1989 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 5/19/1992 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/23/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1993, hitting .471 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/4/1997 to a 2-year deal worth $5,200,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 9/19/1997...
